attributes.action: Change school policies on piercings, nails and hair colour.
attributes.additional_details: Children need to feel like they are able express themselves without being penalised or punished for doing so. This does not affect their education at all. It will affect their wellbeing/mental health not being able to express their individual personalities.
attributes.background: For the government to change the schools policies on piercings, nails and hair colour. As schools say it affects our children's education.

rejection.details:
Uniform policies are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582011
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578439
